Aim of DronaSankalp is to achieve excellence in teaching and learning. We are committed to maintaining extremely high standards of learning and therefore seek only the sincere and hardworking student. We have taken an oath to inspire to aspire for the Best and not settle with anything less. We intend to provide simply the best education and that too at affordable price
